page.title: 19Law and Order
page.content:
In Sudbury police station there are 30 police constables,4 detective constables,4 sergeants and 4 senior officers. In 1985 crime in Sudbury was up by 5% Most crime in Sudbury is committed by people over 21, the commonest crime among the under 14's is petty shoplifting. Prosecutions for criminal damage are up 3% on last year and the most frequent form of damage is arson. There are 2 types of motorbike used in the force, 850cc and 1000cc BMW's. The cars used are Fiestas, Escorts, Granadas and Sierras. Three new cars are bought each year. Transit vans are used for transporting prisoners to and from prison. The nearest prisons are in Colchester and Norwich.
BY JEFFREY MEEKINGS
